UPDATE file_share
share_id = #{bean.shareId},
file_id = #{bean.fileId},
user_id = #{bean.userId},
valid_type = #{bean.validType},
expire_time = #{bean.expireTime},
share_time = #{bean.shareTime},
code = #{bean.code},
show_count = #{bean.showCount},
and share_id like concat('%', #{query.shareIdFuzzy}, '%') and file_id like concat('%', #{query.fileIdFuzzy}, '%') and user_id like concat('%', #{query.userIdFuzzy}, '%')
and expire_time>=str_to_date(#{query.expireTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and expire_time< date_sub(str_to_date(#{query.expireTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d'),interval -1 day)
and share_time>=str_to_date(#{query.shareTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and share_time< date_sub(str_to_date(#{query.shareTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d'),interval -1 day)
and code like concat('%', #{query.codeFuzzy}, '%')
mapper.delete:

and share_time>=str_to_date(#{query.shareTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and share_time< date_sub(str_to_date(#{query.shareTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d'),interval -1 day)
